name: Clearance Sale - Natural Wave
description:
$20 OFF 

Discount Code: JHOSALE


Limited Time Only:

14",16",18" - Brazilian - Natural Wave
16",18",20" - Brazilian - Natural Wave

14",16",18" - Peruvian - Natural Wave
16",18",20" - Peruvian - Natural Wave

name: Brazilian - 3 Bundle Pack
description:
Virgin Brazilian Hair

3.5oz per bundle

100% Virgin Hair "Non-Processed"

Recommendation: 3 Bundles for a full weave

Brazilian hair is one of the most popular types of hair extensions on the market today. It naturally has a lot of body and blends well with African American hair types. All wave patterns can be worn straight, yet they will curl back to its original state when wet. Each bundles cuticle is intact. You will notice each bundle of virgin hair has a natural taper at the ends.

name: Indian - 3 Bundle Pack
description:
Virgin Indian Hair

3.5oz per bundle

100% Virgin Hair "Non-Processed"

Recommendation: 3 Bundles for a full weave

Indian hair is very popular to market. The hair texture is finer and silkier compared to Brazilian, Malaysian, and Peruvian hairs. All wave patterns can be worn straight, but curls back to its original state when wet. Each selections cuticles are all intact and you will notice each selection of virgin hair has a natural taper at the ends.

name: Malaysian - 3 Bundle Pack
description:
Virgin Malaysian Hair

3.5oz per bundle

100% Virgin Hair "Non-Processed"

Recommendation: 3 Bundles for a full weave

Malaysian hair is thicker than Indian and Brazilian hair. Malaysian hair does not carry shine like the Indian virgin hairs, but it does have more body than the Indian and Brazilian hairs. It has a soft and smooth texture, it waves slightly when wet. It naturally has a lot of body and blends well with African American hair types. All wave patterns can be worn straight, but curls back to its original state when wet. Each selections cuticle is intact and you will notice each selection of virgin hair has a natural taper at the ends

name: Peruvian - 3 Bundle Pack
description:
Virgin Peruvian Hair

3.5oz per bundle

100% Virgin Hair "Non-Processed"

Recommendation: 3 Bundles for a full weave

Peruvian hair is fairly new to the market. It is very exotic and blends well with natural or relaxed hair textures. Peruvian hair is very soft, lustrous, and carries lots of volume. All wave patterns can be worn straight, yet they will curl back to its original state when wet.
Each bundles cuticle is intact. You will notice each bundle of virgin hair has a natural taper at the ends.
